blogPost.excerpt: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.
blogPost.body: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.
blogPost.title: Thank you for reading - Personalized Substack summaries
blogPost.author: Tom Terado

localize.description: 阅读和获取知识不应该是一件苦差事。每周从您最喜欢的子栈作者那里获取一份子栈电子邮件摘要。
閱讀和獲取知識不應該是一件苦差事。每週從您最喜歡的子棧作者那裏獲取一份子棧電子郵件摘要。

previous.excerpt: 9 QUESTIONS 24/7 Live Youtube stream quiz game. Rounds of 9 Questions. 15 seconds for each question. You can play with a team or solo. A relaxing quiz game experience. Thousands of quality questions.
previous.title: 9 QUESTIONS - 24/7 live stream quiz game with thousands of questions.

localize.description: 9个问题全天候直播YouTube流问答游戏。共9轮提问。每个问题15秒。你可以组队打球，也可以单人打球。轻松的智力竞赛体验。数以千计的质量问题。
localize.tagline: 24/7全天候直播流问答游戏，包含数千个问题。

localize.description: 9個問題全天候直播YouTube流問答遊戲。共9輪提問。每個問題15秒。你可以組隊打球，也可以單人打球。輕鬆的智力競賽體驗。數以千計的質量問題。
localize.tagline: 24/7全天候直播流問答遊戲，包含數千個問題。

next.excerpt: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
next.title: Brainie - Music patterns to improve deep work, relaxation, and sleep.

localize.description: Brainie使用音乐模式来帮助你的大脑更专注或更放松。专为深度工作而设计，以达到流畅的效果，或在您需要充电时放松休息。您可以切换到不同的音乐模式和不同的节奏，以满足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放松和睡眠的音乐模式。

localize.description: Brainie使用音樂模式來幫助你的大腦更專注或更放鬆。專爲深度工作而設計，以達到流暢的效果，或在您需要充電時放鬆休息。您可以切換到不同的音樂模式和不同的節奏，以滿足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放鬆和睡眠的音樂模式。
